content:
User: Tag each section with base tags or new ones if needed. Return only a JSON array with IDs and tags. If you make new tags, add a "new_tags" object with explanations. No text outside JSON.

Grok: Summarize for Context: Since it's struggling with long back-and-forth, ask it to summarize the last few prompts first. That way, it gets a quick refresher without drowning in details. You can say:
